id: 366 Stoic Quotes of the Day for Notion (Widget)
name: 366 Stoic Quotes of the Day for Notion (Widget)
description: This widget template displays a daily inspirational Stoic quote in your Notion workspaces. One special quote for every one of the 366 possible days of the year. Check it out and get inspired by giants like Marcus Aurelius, Seneca or Epictetus.
